line.originaltext: 2 tablespoons olive oil
3 cups fresh chopped mushrooms
2 green onions, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper
4 ounces cream cheese, softened
1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked
1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in the mushrooms, green onions, garlic and cayenne pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing42, ing43, ing44, ing45, ing46}, ing50, "spiced veggies", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Cook 10 minutes, or until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing50, t9, ing51, "mushroom mixture", "10 minutes or until tender")

line.originaltext: Transfer the mushroom mixture to a medium bowl.
Blend in the cream cheese and crabmeat.
On a lightly floured flat surface, roll each pastry sheet into a 12x12 inch square.
On a lightly floured flat surface, roll each pastry sheet into a 12x12 inch square.
Cut each sheet into nine 4x4 inch squares.
line.annotation: cut(ing53, t11, ing54, "4x4 inch squares", "9 squares")

line.originaltext: Place 1 tablespoon of the mushroom mixture onto each pastry square.
line.annotation: combine({ing52, ing54}, ing55, "unfolded puffs", "1 tablespoon in each sheet")

line.originaltext: Fold the squares by bringing the corners to the center, creating an X. Place the squares on a medium baking sheet.
line.annotation: do(ing55, , ing56, "folded puffs", "fold corners to center of the sheet")

line.originaltext: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing56, t8, ing57, "baked puffs", "20 minutes, or until golden brown")

line.originaltext: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
